channel.title: Empathy-06 [Remake]
channel.description:
[url=http://empathy-06.net46.net][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/k4ck7m.png[/img]Website[/url]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/zqedi.png[/img] Hello members of Moparscape community. We do hope you are enjoying your winter, and we would thank you if you would join our community. Here are a few things that we have recently implemented: [b]Quests progress:
Getrude's Cat - 50% Rune Mysteries - 50 Imp catcher - 50% Doric's quest - 50% Sheap shearer - 50% Cooks Assistant - 50%
[/b]
Anyways, hi guys, Steso here. I am going to show you our current project called Empathy-06 Remake. We are remaking runescape as it was back in 06. Now you're probably thinking "Another lame remake.." NO, this is going to be 100% complete. we have put alot of work into it. [img]http://i.imgur.com/eEGeC.png[/img] [img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/1213/3dbc7c5c80b44d2b8d54d25.png[/img]
[b]Project Log: ====================Forum Sided========================
-Released Website - By Mod Eminem
-Added every board and category - By Mod Lewis
-Deployed advertising on google, Rune-server and moparscape - By Mod Lewis & Mod Eminem
====================Server sided========================= Removed the flame animation from login-screen (Client sided.) - By Mod Eminem
Removed Log Out timer. No more logging out within 30 seconds. - By Mod Eminem
Implemented new Players online interface
Added rune requirement for Varrock teleport. Working on other teleports. - By Mod Eminem
Added ::empty command for easier usage of deleting items. Plus more commands. - By Mod Eminem
Added ::Mod/::admin command to give moderator. - By Mod Eminem
Added ALL teleports. Do not spam the teleport, it will spend runes + Won't tele. Still have to make it give EXP too. - By Mod Eminem
Fixed Admin bug. Admins can now buy/sell items. - By Mod Eminem
Fixed GlobalDrops, it now spawns items but you can't pick up needs work a lot of work done. - By Mod Eminem
Added 25XP per Varrock teleport. Finishing all teleports in the future.
Updated Empathy to Version 1.1 as below. - By Mod Kaxxon
Updated Varrock sword shop - By Mod Kaxxon
Updated some item statistics - By Mod Kaxxon
Added TzHaar banker in autospawn.cfg - By Mod Kaxxon
Adjusted Barrows drop rate. - By Mod Kaxxon
Strength potion 75% functional (Working on empty & use) dose on empty potion
Attack potion 75% functional
Prayer potion 75% functional
Added more working doors. - By Mod Santino
Added basic NPC clipping (needs work). - By Mod Santino
Added Cooks Assistant Quest. - By Mod Santino, Mod Kaxxon
Fixed all eclipse warnings
Emptying done
Wilderness warning
Desert done
Private messaging
Fixed specialing
Giant mole done
Enchanting
All rings and amulets done
Zanaris teleport with staff
Added dialogues to LOTS of npcs.
Sheep Shearing
[B]Working quest handling system with multiple classes so it doesn't get cluttered with 100 + quests[/b]
All events converted to tasks
Object handling for all types of objects
Shops class with arrays done
Magic Carpet done (A little buggy though)
Requirements to quest items
Waterskins done
Splitchat saving done
Skillhandler done
Skill guides done
Prayer skill done
All spawns added
All shops added
All prices dumped
All events converted to tasks
Added cooks assistant quest
Bank pins added
Emote handler added
[B]Added item handler for fillables and emptying.
[B]Added combat handler for all teles Ancients, Moderns, and normal Magic Class[/b]
Added enchanting
Added around 10 random events
Added exp rate 1x so it's like runescape
[B]Changed everything to say Empathy-06 (Nearly)
Added item requiremts for quests
Added flour mill
Added crystal chest
Added sailing
Added gnome glider
Fixed many bugs
Hostblack listing added so people can't use vpn's when there ip banned
Fixed gameframe to show music tab
Added reportbug command
Added enterting shilo village with mosol rei (I think that's his name)
Added picking s and selling them
Added lots of more dialogues
Added sheep shearing[/b]
Added all bankers/bank chests
Added proper banker dialogues
Added private messaging
Redid commands class
Added aggressivness for a bunch more monsters
Redid packaging
Fixed more bugs
Added tramp that asks for coins
Added lumbridge guide
Added party peet dialogues
Added bartender who sells beer
Added charging glories
Added enterting kq lair with rope
Added spinning
Re-done food class
Removed all minigames redoing all of them
Re-done barrows should be almost perfect
Fixed barrows minimap bug
Added around 10 + 2006 bosses
Added kbd effects
Added cooking
Added potatoes
Added eco reset
Added random events handler
Redid random events system more effecient now
Cleaned up lots of process
Fixed lots of bugs for random events
Added clipped following
Added clipped npcs
Cleaned up lots of things
Added some commands for developers use
Fixed some java exception errors
Added imp's catcher
Added doric's quest
Added sheep shearer
Fixed another java exception error
Firemaking added
Countless bug fixes added
Added Restless Ghost
Added Rune Mysteries
Added Vampyre Slayer
Added Romeo and Juliet
Added Gertrudes Cat
Added quest dialouges for 9 quests
Added some more things to quest handling to make it easier
Added actions for all the quests
Added clicking buttons all the quests
Added rewards for all the quests with reward handler
Added stage for all the quests with stage handler
Fixed 20 + bugs
Tons of more bug fixes
Added witchs potion
Fixed some witchs potion bugs
Fixed some bugs for restless ghost
Added some more dialogues for npcs
Fixed some bugs
Added 200 more spawns
Added pirates treasure
Fixed more bugs
Added more spawns
Fixed some shops bugs
[B]Added proper sailing (Dialogues, all boats, all npcs can sail you, cash for karamja)[/b]
Fixed banana selling
Fixed a cash dupe
[B]Fixed some more bugs, added lots of activities in karamja that are in rs[/b]
Added some more shops for some quests
[B]Added transporting rum to port sarim from karamja with correct dialogues[/b]
Added option to enter mole holes or not
Finished pirates treasure finally
Added some more working objects
Fixed a bunch of bugs
Re-done packaging
Removed tons of useless things
Added cache downloader
Added superheating
Added some random event fixes
Re-done prayer
Re-done a lot of packing
Buffed up random event system a lot
Fixed some more bugs
In-game report system now works [/b] And tons more.[/center]

item.title: Empathy-06 [Remake]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Steso, post:5, topic:477832”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=596027.msg4196505#msg4196505 date=1357580498]

Removed the flame animation from login-screen (Client sided.) - By Mod Eminem

Removed Log Out timer. No more logging out within 30 seconds. - By Mod Eminem

Implemented new Players online interface

Added ::empty command for easier usage of deleting items. Plus more commands. - By Mod Eminem

All these ^ Are incorrect for a legit 06 remake.

  1. You need the flames to consider it a real remake
  2. It was a 2 minute log-out in 06, I believe (Or 07).
  3. ::Empty never existed.

I couldn’t care to read the rest. You should get better organization. Put the updates in [ code] format, sorted by each day/set of updates.
Also, I skimmed and saw you say something about the teleports 4/5 times at least. Really, you should just put “Improved the magebook teleports” not “Fixed varrock teleport and others” Like really? Varrock isn’t that important in 06. Lumby was where it was at.

Post A LOT more pictures. We’re not going to believe half this is added if you have no pictures.
[/quote]Flames will be re-added upon next month.

removed 30 seconds, that means we have added 2 minutes.
Do not have any more pictures YET[/quote]
Then you should say you changed] it. Not removed.

With all those features, you should have tons of pictures.

Read full topic

item.title: Empathy-06 [Remake]
item.dc:creator: @Steso Steso
item.description:
@Steso wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:477832”][quote author=Steso link=topic=596027.msg4196491#msg4196491 date=1357578339]
Removed the flame animation from login-screen (Client sided.) - By Mod Eminem

Removed Log Out timer. No more logging out within 30 seconds. - By Mod Eminem

Implemented new Players online interface

Added ::empty command for easier usage of deleting items. Plus more commands. - By Mod Eminem
[/quote]
All these ^ Are incorrect for a legit 06 remake.

  1. You need the flames to consider it a real remake
  2. It was a 2 minute log-out in 06, I believe (Or 07).
  3. ::Empty never existed.

I couldn’t care to read the rest. You should get better organization. Put the updates in [ code] format, sorted by each day/set of updates.
Also, I skimmed and saw you say something about the teleports 4/5 times at least. Really, you should just put “Improved the magebook teleports” not “Fixed varrock teleport and others” Like really? Varrock isn’t that important in 06. Lumby was where it was at.

Post A LOT more pictures. We’re not going to believe half this is added if you have no pictures.[/quote]Flames will be re-added upon next month.

removed 30 seconds, that means we have added 2 minutes.
Do not have any more pictures YET

Read full topic

item.title: Empathy-06 [Remake]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Steso, post:1, topic:477832”]Removed the flame animation from login-screen (Client sided.) - By Mod Eminem

Removed Log Out timer. No more logging out within 30 seconds. - By Mod Eminem

Implemented new Players online interface

Added ::empty command for easier usage of deleting items. Plus more commands. - By Mod Eminem[/quote]
All these ^ Are incorrect for a legit 06 remake.

  1. You need the flames to consider it a real remake
  2. It was a 2 minute log-out in 06, I believe (Or 07).
  3. ::Empty never existed.

I couldn’t care to read the rest. You should get better organization. Put the updates in [ code] format, sorted by each day/set of updates.
Also, I skimmed and saw you say something about the teleports 4/5 times at least. Really, you should just put “Improved the magebook teleports” not “Fixed varrock teleport and others” Like really? Varrock isn’t that important in 06. Lumby was where it was at.

Post A LOT more pictures. We’re not going to believe half this is added if you have no pictures.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Steso wrote:

Website

[center]

zqedi.png751×120

Hello members of Moparscape community. We do hope you are enjoying your winter, and we would thank you if you would join our community. Here are a few things that we have recently implemented:
[b]Quests progress:

Getrude’s Cat - 50%
Rune Mysteries - 50
Imp catcher - 50%
Doric’s quest - 50%
Sheap shearer - 50%
Cooks Assistant - 50%

[/b]

Anyways, hi guys, Steso here.
I am going to show you our current project called Empathy-06 Remake.
We are remaking runescape as it was back in 06.
Now you’re probably thinking “Another lame remake…”
NO, this is going to be 100% complete. we have put alot of work into it.

[b]Project Log:
====================Forum Sided========================

-Released Website - By Mod Eminem

-Added every board and category - By Mod Lewis

-Deployed advertising on google, Rune-server and moparscape - By Mod Lewis & Mod Eminem

====================Server sided=========================

Fixed GlobalDrops, it now spawns items but you can’t pick up needs work a lot of work done. - By Mod Eminem
